column4: Urgent need of help... my GNOME panels both just froze up... not responding to anything... the desktop is still running, the window can be switched via alt-tab although it doesn't register with the bottom panel... please, help...

Urgent need of help... my GNOME panels both just froze up... not responding to anything... the desktop is still running, the window can be switched via alt-tab although it doesn't register with the bottom panel... please, help...
Please help. This is really, really disturbing
ctrl+alt+backspace. save your work before doing this.
